props.title: Messages
props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.messagesInPerSecond`) as 'Messages in per second' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Bytes in and out
props.hint: Network IO brokers in the cluster in bytes per second.
props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.ioInPerSecond`) as 'Bytes in', average(`kafka.broker.ioOutPerSecond`) as 'Bytes out' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Bytes written
props.hint: Number of bytes written to a topic by the broker per second.
props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.bytesWrittenToTopicPerSecond`) as 'Bytes written' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Produce requests failed per second
props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.request.produceRequestsFailedPerSecond`) as 'Requests' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Request produce time 99 percentile
props.hint: Time for produce requests for 99th percentile.
props.query: SELECT average(`kafka.broker.request.produceTime99Percentile`) as 'Requests' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
